meta.title: Ingested file: Cannot gauge tickets Show changes.pdf

content_excerpt:
Ben Carter <benrobcarter@gmail.com>
Show changes
BoxOffice <boxoffice@brightonfringe.org>
1 May 2025 at 13:19
To: Ben Carter <benrobcarter@gmail.com>
Hi Ben,
I have removed the event from the website for you. As it's un-ticketed we can't contact anyone
planning to attend to let them know of the cancellation, but it will no longer be online.
Many thanks,
Elin Eaton (she/her)
Box Office Manager
A: Office 4 at The Old Court House, 118 Church Street, Brighton, BN1 1UD 
P: 01273 91 72 72 
W: www.brightonfringe.org
